text: The Survivors is a 1983 American comedy movie directed by Michael Ritchie and starring Walter Matthau, Robin Williams, Jerry Reed, Kristen Vigard, John Goodman, Annie McEnroe, James Wainwright. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Vermont Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Survivors (movie)
